sensitivity_tooltip.sidestickmod.config: This changes how fast your pitch and yaw change
js_sensitivity_tooltip.sidestickmod.conf: This changes whether you have to partly twist the sidestick or fully to jump/sneak
attack_cooldown_tooltip.sidestickmod.con: This changes how fast you can left click while holding your attack key on the sidestick
debug_mode_tooltip.sidestickmod.config: This changes whether you will be spammed with debug messages or not to test EVERYTHING
